text.author: Chuck Schumer
text.summary: In his inaugural speech before the 117th Congress, the new Democratic Senate Majority Leader expresses his hopefulness after President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris's inauguration, welcomes new Democratic senators Padilla, Ossoff, and Warnock, and pledges that the Senate will legislate and be active, responsive, energetic, and bold.
text.title: Maiden Speech
